name: Vnesis
summary: Vnesis is a game inspired by the eighties, a 2D perspective game in a 3D environment. There are more than 16 challenging levels to explore. The combination of action and responsiveness in the game of continuous excitement makes it unique and entertaining.

name: VN Dating Sims: Masa SMA
summary:
In the story, You play as a male main character and as a high school student in Indonesia. You are transfered student from Cimahi, and had been transfered to Garuda International High School that's all students there are very rich and genius.
You can determine their own pace in the story, otherwise it will be exposed to the skill status where it will determine to the next event. Must do the best!

name: VNC: Virtual Nightclub
summary:
The ultimate music game. Explore a vast network of fully navigable 3D environments in this role playing adventure. Trade with characters, solve puzzles, and win games to collect sixteen S-Warps. Bring them back to the time machine to transport yourself to a mind-blowing ride through The Escape. Watch the clock: you only have six hours to complete the game.

â€‹In order to succeed, jump the five timezones to find all the clues to a virtual murder mystery. Solve the enigma of cosmic consciousness, find the code that controls time and space and play music games with Herbie Hancock, PM Dawn, Stereo MC's and Redman & Suga in the Def Jam Club to win the essential S-Warps.
